title: Photography Contest
description: Capture stunning moments from around the world. Show us your unique perspective through the lens.
prizes: Top 3 entries will receive DSLR cameras and online feature on our platform.

title: Poetry Slam
description: Express your emotions through powerful words. Original poems only in any style or form.
prizes: Publication in literary magazine and ₹7,500 cash prize
rules: Submit as PDF or Word document

title: Code Challenge
description: Solve real-world coding problems under time pressure. Show off your technical skills.
prizes: ₹10,000 Amazon voucher and internship opportunities with tech partners
rules: No plagiarism - all code must be original
Complete within 3 hours of start time

title: Drawing Contest
description: Showcase your drawing skills in any medium. Theme: 'Urban Life'
prizes: Art supplies worth ₹8,000 and exhibition opportunity

title: Short Story Contest
description: Craft compelling short stories that captivate readers. Any genre welcome.
prizes: Publication in annual anthology and ₹5,000 prize for winner

title: UI Design Battle
description: Design sleek interfaces under pressure. Theme revealed at competition start.
prizes: Cash prizes up to ₹15,000 and 1-year design toolkit license

title: Eco Poster Making
description: Create impactful posters promoting environmental awareness and sustainability.
prizes: Premium art supplies package and certificate of excellence
rules: Use eco-friendly materials if physical submission

title: Startup Idea Pitch
description: Pitch your innovative startup ideas to industry experts and investors.
prizes: 3-month mentorship program and seed funding up to ₹50,000

title: Gaming Tournament
description: Battle it out in popular multiplayer games. Games include Valorant, FIFA, and Tekken.
prizes: High-end gaming peripherals and championship trophy

title: Winter Hackathon
description: 24-hour coding marathon to build innovative solutions for winter-themed challenges.
prizes: Tech gadgets, certificates and internship offers with sponsors
rules: Team of up to 4 members allowed
Project must be deployed and demoed

title: Logo Redesign
description: Revamp our brand identity with your creative logo design skills.
prizes: Winning logo will be featured + ₹8,000 cash prize

title: Music Composition
description: Compose original music pieces inspired by the theme 'Journey Through Time'.
prizes: Professional studio recording time and online distribution deal
rules: Submit as MP3 or WAV format

title: Monsoon Photography
description: Capture the essence, beauty and drama of the monsoon season through your lens.
prizes: Photo gear vouchers worth ₹10,000 and online exhibition feature
rules: No filters or heavy editing allowed
Photo must clearly reflect monsoon theme

title: Blog-a-thon
description: Write engaging, well-researched blogs on trending topics in technology and culture.
prizes: ₹3,000 Amazon voucher and content publishing deal
rules: Plagiarism will lead to immediate disqualification
Submit as Word document or Google Doc

title: Mini App Contest
description: Build small but impactful applications that solve specific problems.
prizes: ₹5,000 cash prize and feature in our app gallery

title: Creative Caption
description: Show your wit and creativity by coming up with the best captions for viral images.
prizes: Social media spotlight and ₹2,000 gift card

title: Tech Trivia
description: Test your technology knowledge in this fast-paced online trivia competition.
rules: No external help or research during quiz
